modmenu.descriptionTranslation.leawind_t: A practical, smooth, feature-rich third-person mod.
leawind_third_person.text.title: Leawind's Third Person
leawind_third_person.text.description: A practical, smooth, feature-rich third-person mod.
leawind_third_person.button.sync_to_aimi: Synchronize the settings from aiming mode。
leawind_third_person.button.sync_to_norm: Synchronize the settings from normal mode。
leawind_third_person.option_category.ite: Item predicates to match items. Reference to https://leawind.github.io/Third-Person/en-US/?search=Item+Predicate
leawind_third_person.option_group.camera: Adjust the camera-to-player distance factor using the mouse wheel when holding specific keys in third-person mode. This setting determines the adjustment range.
leawind_third_person.option_group.aiming: When aiming with bow, crossbow, trident, etc.
leawind_third_person.option_group.player: Fade out the player in tight spaces to avoid obstructing the view.
leawind_third_person.option_group.adjust: By default, holding Z allows you to use the mouse to adjust the camera's offset and distance.
leawind_third_person.option_group.behavi: How the player rotates when pressing the interact key (attack|use|select).
leawind_third_person.option.is_mod_enabl: Disabling this will show the original third-person perspective, but you can still open the configuration screen with a key.
leawind_third_person.option.center_offse: When the entity the camera is attached to is flying with elytra, do not use camera offset.
leawind_third_person.option.temp_first_p: Temporarily enter first person while player is in narrow space.
leawind_third_person.option.player_fade_: When player blocks the sight, make the player semi-transparent.
leawind_third_person.option.gaze_opacity: When crosshair on entity, set entity opacity to this value.
leawind_third_person.option.player_invis: When camera is close enough, player becomes invisible.
leawind_third_person.option.use_camera_p: Use camera pick in creative mode
In creative mode, the player's line of sight will not be obstructed, and the crosshair indicates the interaction point.
leawind_third_person.option.lock_camera_: After locking, it is impossible to rotate up and down.
leawind_third_person.option.auto_turn_bo: Automatically turn sideways when drawing a bow
Automatically turn sideways when drawing a bow, with the hand holding the bow in front and the hand pulling the string behind.
leawind_third_person.option.available_di: Use the mouse wheel to adjust the camera-to-player distance. This option represents the number of distance levels.
leawind_third_person.option.camera_dista: The minimum distance factor from the player when adjusting with the mouse wheel.
The maximum distance from the player when adjusting with the mouse wheel.
leawind_third_person.option.flying_smoot: Smoothness for camera following player during flight
leawind_third_person.option.t2f_transiti: Smoothness when transition from third-person to first-person.
leawind_third_person.option.adjusting_ca: Smoothness for changes in camera offset as the mouse moves while adjusting the camera.
leawind_third_person.option.adjusting_di: Smoothness for changes in camera-to-player distance when adjusting the camera.
leawind_third_person.option.distance_smo: Time for the camera to move away from the player.
leawind_third_person.option.aiming_fov_d: FOV zoom factor when aiming. The distance between the camera and the player will also change accordingly.
Whether the player is in the center of the screen.
leawind_third_person.option.offset_cente: Long-pressing specific keys can center the view. When centered, the X offset is fixed at 0, and the player is in the middle of the screen. This option adjusts the Y offset at this time.
leawind_third_person.option.camera_ray_t: When the targeted object exceeds this distance while aiming, the player's line of sight will be parallel to the camera's line of sight.
leawind_third_person.option.camera_dista: You will find the difference when adjusting the camera offset.
leawind_third_person.option.enable_targe: Enable target entity prediction when aiming
When aiming, predict the target entity you want to shoot, calculate the player's rotation based on this, for better aiming at the target.
leawind_third_person.option.skip_vanilla: Only first-person and third-person perspectives are retained
leawind_third_person.option.disable_thir: In third person, disable view bobbing
leawind_third_person.option.allow_double: In third person mode, allow the vanilla double-tap sprinting feature
leawind_third_person.option.auto_rotate_: When pressing the interact key (attack|use|select), the player will automatically rotate.
leawind_third_person.option.determine_ai: When specific animation is played, automatically enter aiming mode.
leawind_third_person.option.hold_to_aim_: When the player's left or right hand is holding an item that matches any rule, automatically enter aiming mode.
leawind_third_person.option.use_to_aim_i: When the item the player is using matches any rule, automatically enter aiming mode.
leawind_third_person.option.use_to_first: Temporarily enter first person when used
When the item the player is using matches any rule, temporarily enter first-person view.
key.leawind_third_person.toggle_side: Toggle camera to the other side
key.leawind_third_person.toggle_aiming: Short press to toggle aiming state
